meanings.definition: Forbidden or prohibited by Islamic law.
meanings.sent1: Eating pork is haram for Muslims.
meanings.sent2: It is haram to lie in Islam.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat found the haram cookies and ate them all.
meanings.sent4: Breaking the rules felt like stepping into a haram territory.
meanings.sent5: The haram sign on the door warned everyone to stay out.

meanings.sent1: Stealing is considered haram in many cultures.
meanings.sent2: It is haram to cheat on a test.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy made a haram mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: His actions painted a haram picture of his character.
meanings.sent5: The haram act left a stain on his conscience.

meanings.sent1: Muslims visit the haram in Mecca for pilgrimage.
meanings.sent2: The haram in Mecca is a place of great reverence.
meanings.sent3: The curious child wondered about the haram in Mecca.
meanings.sent4: Her heart longed to visit the haram in Mecca.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the haram in Mecca left him speechless.
